comment: Hi , I'm Dennis , I'll be looking after lily's twitter for a while . I can only communicate in gif form , and I'm going on a hate blocking spree .
amr:
# ::snt Hi , I'm Dennis , I'll be looking after lily's twitter for a while . I can only communicate in gif form , and I'm going on a hate blocking spree .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (h / hi)
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Dennis")
                  :domain ii))
      :snt2 (l / look-after-07
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (p2 / publication
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Twitter")
                  :poss (p3 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Lily")))
            :duration (w / while))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (p4 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (c / communicate-01
                        :ARG0 ii2
                        :manner (f / form
                              :mod (g / gif))
                        :mod (o / only)))
            :op2 (g2 / go-02
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (s2 / spree
                        :mod (b / block-01
                              :ARG0 ii2
                              :ARG1 (h2 / hate-01))))))

comment: Dennis please pass on my love and solidarity
amr:

      :ARG1 (a / and
